did.unittitle: Version 4, edited typescript, p. 118-650 (scattered). Renumbered p. 113-591 (scattered).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This version appears to represent an early version of the manuscript submitted to Scott and possibly Hicks as well. Editing appears to be primarily by Scott [pencil]. Editing of Scott's editing also apparent--possibly by Hicks. Notes in what appears to be Arnow's hand on back of p. 183. Some correspondence to published version.
